parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.51</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Camera Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>



</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Creates the camera shaking effect, like when you are near an explosion </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''addCamShake''' [power, duration, frequency] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> power: [[Number]] - Strength of shake, practical range is 0 to 20 (how strong the camera movement will be).  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> duration: [[Number]] - Duration in seconds (how long the effect will last) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> frequency: [[Number]] - Frequency of shake, practical range is 0 to 100 (how will be the rhythm). </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[addCamShake]] [10, 1, 25];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[enableCamShake]] [[true]];
[[addCamShake]] [5, 5, 25];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[enableCamShake]], [[setCamShakeDefParams]], [[setCamShakeParams]], [[resetCamShake]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
